description:
Wade was helping out at one of our bar events when he saw a promotional clip of Patrick in action playing on the big screen. Let's just say that definitely got Wade’s attention. Two weeks later, he was here fucking the shit out of Patrick.
Patrick has come a long way from the days when he simply surfed and banged chicks. He remains wild about his girlfriend(s), but as you can see, he also gets a big kick out of being with our guys.
Lucky for us, Patrick just keeps getting hotter and hotter each time!
title: Patrick & Wade
